title: Non-aural set, string Scherzo - mm 7-8 cadence

content.description: Below is an excerpt from a trio for violin, viola, and cello.
content.question: The cadence in measures 7-8 is best described as

choices.label: an imperfect authentic cadence in the tonic
a perfect authentic cadence in the dominant
a deceptive cadence in the relative minor
a half cadence in the tonic

content.answer: a perfect authentic cadence in the dominant

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in notated music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
